language.entry: Hero was Hit: Self: {colour_start|mark}Mark{colour_end} Target {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(1 rd){colour_end}
Transform: {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end} Inflicted on Party Reduced to +2
The burden is mine alone to bear.
What now is my purpose, if not violence?
I am pure. I am pure. I am pure.
Verse XXXVI: the Light shines brightest in darkness.
The Flame is but half the story...
I still feel it in my veins...
On Any Action: Self: {colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end} 2pts/rd for 1 rd
There is power in the blood...
On Any Action: Self: {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end} 2pts/rd for 1 rd
On Any Action: Self: {colour_start|stealth}Stealth{colour_end}(33%% Chance, 2 rd)
Surely we can make a deal...
{colour_start|skill_unselectable}Only applies to kills in mode Beast{colour_end}
On Ranged Attack Hit: Self: .kill {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(2%% Chance){colour_end}
Tracking Shot & Pistol Shot: Adds {colour_start|stun}Stun{colour_end} {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(140%% base){colour_end}
On Monster Kill: {colour_start|buff}Buff Self:{colour_end} +3%% Max HP {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(Permanent){colour_end}
Negates Crimson Curse - Wasting Stat Changes
On Attack Crit: Self: Disable Stunning Blow {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(1 rd){colour_end}
Smite/Holy Lance: Adds {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end} 3pts/rd for 1 rd {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(140%% base){colour_end}
{colour_start|skill_unselectable}Just for fun, only obtainable via command line{colour_end}
Immune to death by Crimson Curse
Hero was Hit: Self: {colour_start|mark}Mark{colour_end} Target {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(1 rd){colour_end}
Transform: {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end} Inflicted on Party Reduced to +2
The burden is mine alone to bear.
What now is my purpose, if not violence?
I am pure. I am pure. I am pure.
Verse XXXVI: the Light shines brightest in darkness.
The Flame is but half the story...
I still feel it in my veins...

On Attack Crit: Self: Disable Stunning Blow {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(1 rd){colour_end}

{colour_start|skill_unselectable}Just for fun, only obtainable via command line{colour_end}
Immune to death by Crimson Curse
鼓舞乐章：禁用{colour_start|stress}压力治疗{colour_end}效果
独奏:延长{colour_start|mark}标记{colour_end}持续时间至1场战斗
变身：使用后对其他英雄造成的{colour_start|stress}压力{colour_end}减至2
击杀怪物：{colour_start|buff}增益自身：{colour_end}+5%%{colour_start|stress}美德{colour_end}概率{colour_start|skill_unselectable}（1任务）{colour_end}
绳钩切削/靠近点！：添加{colour_start|move}拉前{colour_end}1{colour_start|skill_unselectable}格效果（110%%基础概率）{colour_end}
绳钩切削/死亡标记：{colour_start|debuff}减益目标{colour_end}：
如果不是消除暴行，我现在的目的是什么？
猎犬冲刺/猎犬骚扰：移除{colour_start|bleed}流血{colour_end}效果
我为纯洁。我为纯洁。我为纯洁。
光照在黑暗里，黑暗却不接受光————《圣经》约翰福音第一章第五节。
神圣抚慰/神圣恩惠：禁用{colour_start|healhp}治疗{colour_end}效果
贯穿：添加{colour_start|bleed}流血{colour_end}2伤害/每回合，持续3回合{colour_start|skill_unselectable}（140%%基础概率）{colour_end}
我依然能感觉到，它在我的血管里......
任意行动：自身：{colour_start|bleed}流血{colour_end}2伤害/每回合，持续1回合
一股力量流淌在我的血液中......
这一切正变得如此暗绿...
任意行动：自身：{colour_start|blight}腐蚀{colour_end}（2伤害/每回合，持续1回合）
任意行动：{colour_start|buff}增益全队{colour_end}：+20%%受到的{colour_start|healhp}治疗{colour_end}
%d%%受到的{colour_start|stress}恐惧{colour_end}造成的压力伤害
任意行动：自身：{colour_start|stealth}潜行{colour_end}(33%%概率，持续2回合)
我们当然可以达成交易......
{colour_start|skill_unselectable}击杀效果只适用于野兽形态{colour_end}
远程攻击命中：自身：即死{colour_start|skill_unselectable}(2%%概率){colour_end}
击杀怪物：{colour_start|buff}增益自身：{colour_end}+1速度{colour_start|skill_unselectable}（1任务）{colour_end}
深渊炮击：添加{colour_start|move}拉前{colour_end}2{colour_start|skill_unselectable}格效果（140%%基础概率）{colour_end}
追踪射击和手枪射击：添加{colour_start|stun}眩晕{colour_end}效果{colour_start|skill_unselectable}（140%%基础概率）{colour_end}
击杀怪物：{colour_start|buff}增益自身：{colour_end}+3%%最大生命值{colour_start|skill_unselectable}（1任务）{colour_end}
取消猩红诅咒——凋零状态的改变
击杀怪物：{colour_start|buff}增益自身：{colour_end}+3%%{colour_start|scouting}侦察{colour_end}概率{colour_start|skill_unselectable}（1任务）{colour_end}
攻击暴击：自身：技能无法眩晕{colour_start|skill_unselectable}（1回合）{colour_end}
惩戒/圣矛：添加{colour_start|blight}腐蚀{colour_end}3伤害/每回合，持续1回合{colour_start|skill_unselectable}（140%%基础概率）{colour_end}
有时候贪婪点也不是什么坏事！
{colour_start|skill_unselectable}就是个小彩蛋，只能通过输入命令获得{colour_end}
延长猩红诅咒渴血状态
免疫因猩红诅咒而死亡
